message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer for it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can do $110, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. What do you think?
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. How about $105?
I see you're willing to meet me in the middle, Bob! I can do $105, but I'm thinking I can get a bit more out of it. How about $115?
I'm getting close, but I'm still not comfortable with $115. Can you try to meet me at $100?
